thread.section_title: DialAFlight Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DialAFlight | www.dialaflight.com | 9 of 122
thread.title: Paul Hickey

author: Paul Hickey
title: Paul Hickey
text:
This was my very first time at booking a long hall filght so coming across Dial a Flght on my internet search was for me the best start.
I called Dial a Flight and spoke to a lady by the name of Chrissie Mistry who was very helpfull, friendly and most of all put my mind at ease, I told Chrissie my requirements to which she made many calls back and forth over many hours and came back to me with what I now know as a great deal.
My trip from leaving LHR to Australia was out of this world, I would certainly recommend Dial a Flight to a family member or friend in the future.
Thank you Chrissie and Dial a Flight
Kind Regards
Paul Hickey
